title: Storage & File Organization
subject: Database Management Systems
theory:
How data sits on HDD/SSD. 
- **Block**: Minimum I/O unit (e.g., 4KB change).
- **Heap File**: Rows stored in any free space (Fast Insert).
- **Sequential File**: Rows sorted by Key (Fast Search).
- **Hashing**: Static/Dynamic hashing for O(1) access.
